subject: Football
Cartoons and Cartoonists
Comic Books and Strips
organizations: Buick Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: The comic strip “Tank McNamara” is drawing a lot of scrutiny for its portrayal of N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell’s handling of the Michael Vick case and others.
snippet: The comic strip “Tank McNamara” is drawing a lot of scrutiny for its portrayal of N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell’s handling of the Michael Vick case and others.
